line_1: And through respiring Pores your Blood refines.
line_2: But genuine Heat, Nature for Health designs,

line_1: The glorious orb the day refines.
line_2: Thus Envy breaks, thus Merit shines.

line_1: It takes no Spot but still refines;
line_2: The more 'tis worn, the more it shines.

line_1: And how can Phoebus, who the Muse refines,
line_2: Smooth the dull Numbers when he seldom shines.

line_1: Thro' all her charms, and all refines.
line_2: More, by the meaning soul that shines

line_1: Flows the red slag, the lengthening bar refines;
line_2: Strokes follow strokes, the sparkling ingot shines,

line_1: Charm'd by your touch, the kneaded clay refines,
line_2: The biscuit hardens, the enamel shines;

line_1: Or who on former schemes refines,
line_2: And only talks by sounds and signs,

line_1: Less Lustre waits the God, when he refines
line_2: The rip'ning Metal in Peruvian Mines;

line_1: How the Wit brightens! How the Style refines!
line_2: But let a Lord once own the happy Lines,

line_1: Which his unerring Judgment so refines,
line_2: That thro' the whole a pleasing Lustre shines;
